text: Quite Contrary is the seventh studio album, ninth album overall, by American queercore band Pansy Division, it was released on September 9, 2016 by Alternative Tentacles. ==Track listing== ==Personnel== Pansy Division *Jon Ginoli – guitar, vocals *Chris Freeman – bass, vocals *Luis Illades – drums, percussion *Joel Reader – lead guitar, vocals Category:2016 albums Category:Pansy Division albums
title: Quite Contrary
